mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_NOTICE(NOTICE_NO , NOTICE_TITLE , NOTICE_CONTENT) VALUES(SEQ_NOTICE_NO.NEXTVAL , #{noticeTitle} , #{noticeContent})
mapper.select: SELECT NOTICE_NO , NOTICE_TITLE , NOTICE_CONTENT , TO_CHAR(NOTICE_REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "NOTICE_REG_DATE" FROM TB_NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_NO = #{noticeNo} AND NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_INQUIRY(INQUIRY_NO , INQUIRY_CONTENT , INQUIRY_TYPE , MEMBER_ID , PROD_NO) VALUES(SEQ_INQUIRY_NO.NEXTVAL , #{inquiryContent} , #{inquiryType} , #{memberId} , null #{prodNo})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_INQUIRY WHERE INQUIRY_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT INQUIRY_NO , INQUIRY_CONTENT , INQUIRY_TYPE , TO_CHAR(INQUIRY_CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "INQUIRY_CREATE_DATE" FROM TB_INQUIRY WHERE INQUIRY_STATUS = 'Y' AND MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} ORDER BY INQUIRY_NO DESC

SELECT INQUIRY_NO , INQUIRY_TYPE , INQUIRY_CONTENT , TO_CHAR(INQUIRY_CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "INQUIRY_CREATE_DATE" , MEMBER_ID , PROD_NAME FROM TB_INQUIRY LEFT JOIN TB_PRODUCT USING(PROD_NO) WHERE INQUIRY_NO = #{inquiryNo} AND INQUIRY_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT INQUIRY_REPLY_NO , INQUIRY_REPLY_CONTENT , MEMBER_ID , TO_CHAR(INQUIRY_REPLY_CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "INQUIRY_REPLY_CREATE_DATE" FROM TB_INQUIRY_REPLY JOIN TB_MEMBER USING(MEMBER_ID) WHERE INQUIRY_NO = #{inquiryReplyNo} AND INQUIRY_REPLY_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY INQUIRY_REPLY_NO DESC
